TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GenericWebPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart

summary.span: 对不是 控件的服务器控件进行包装，使其在运行时与真正的 控件具有相同的外观和行为。

span.span: Wraps server controls that are not controls so that they can appear and behave as true controls at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存在控件为服务器控件不提供运行时包装控制，以便可以在 Web 部件页和应用程序中使用此类控件。The control exists to provide a run-time wrapper for server controls that are not controls, so that such controls can be used in Web Parts pages and applications. 当开发人员添加服务器控件-如用户控件、 ASP.NET 服务器控件或现有的自定义控件-个控件，控件自动换行的服务器控件在运行时使它们可能会表现出相同为 true，则功能控件。When developers add server controls--such as user controls, ASP.NET server controls, or existing custom controls--to a control, the control automatically wraps the server controls at run time so they can exhibit the same functionality as true controls. 下表进行比较和对比控件和控件。The following table compares and contrasts controls and controls. | 控件 control| 控件 control| |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |存在使服务器控件不控件，与 Web 部件的功能，因此使任何 ASP.NET 中，自定义控件或用户控件可以参与 Web 部件应用程序。Exists to equip server controls that are not controls with Web Parts functionality, so that any ASP.NET, custom, or user control can participate in Web Parts applications.|存在是为了创建具有本机内置的 Web 部件功能的自定义 ASP.NET 控件。Exists to create custom ASP.NET controls that have native Web Parts functionality built in. 这包括个性化设置、 连接、 导入和导出和拖放功能。This includes personalization, connections, import and export, and drag-and-drop capabilities.| |永远不会在页面的标记中声明。Is never declared in the markup of a page. 仅在运行时，包装服务器控件并为包装的控件 （或子控件） 提供的全部功能的存在控件。It exists only to wrap server controls at run time, and to give the wrapped control (or child control) the full functionality of a control.|可以声明一个页面标记中在设计时，如 ASP.NET 服务器控件，不同之处在于在其中声明区域。Can be declared in the markup of a page at design time, like an ASP.NET server control, except that it is declared in a zone.| |包括且集成到 Web 部件个性化设置进程，以便它可以充当真正其子控件控件。Includes and integrates its child control into the Web Parts personalization process so that it can act as a true control. 发生这种情况自动，这使开发人员简单地在 Web 部件应用程序中使用服务器控件和用户控件。This occurs automatically, which makes it simple for developers to use server controls and user controls in Web Parts applications.|自动包含在 Web 部件个性化设置过程。Is automatically included in the Web Parts personalization process.| |可以在运行时以编程方式访问 (通过使用方法，并将其传递给子服务器控件)，类似于真正控件或标准的 ASP.NET 控件。Can be accessed programmatically at run time (by using the method and passing to it the child server control), like a true control or a standard ASP.NET control.|可以访问以编程方式在运行时，类似于标准的 ASP.NET 控件。Can be accessed programmatically at run time, like a standard ASP.NET control.| 用户得益于控制，因为它提供了一致的用户体验。Users benefit from the control because it provides a consistent user experience. 可为任何服务器控件功能类似于控件，并将具有相同的一致的用户界面 (UI) 元素，如谓词、 图标、 标题和一个标头。Any server control can be made to function like a control, and will have the same consistent user interface (UI) elements such as verbs, icons, a title, and a header. 开发人员受益于控制，因为它使他们能够重复使用现有的用户控件和 Web 部件应用程序中的服务器控件。Developers benefit from the control because it enables them to reuse existing user controls and server controls within Web Parts applications. > [!NOTE] > 在创建 Web 部件页时，无需执行任何操作即可启用现有的用户控件或自定义控件进行包装控件。When you create Web Parts pages, you do not have to do anything to enable an existing user control or custom control to be wrapped with the control. 只需将添加到服务器或用户控件区域，以编程方式或通过在页面的标记中声明并自动设置的 Web 部件控件包装您的控件与在运行时对象。Simply add your server or user control to a zone, either programmatically or by declaring it in the page's markup, and the Web Parts control set automatically wraps your control with a object at run time. 因为服务器控件都将置于区域使用封装控件在运行时，开发人员可以使用普通服务器和用户控制完全像它们是一样控件。Because server controls that are placed in zones are wrapped with a control at run time, developers can use ordinary server and user controls exactly as if they were controls. 请注意，如果声明自定义控件继承自基类中，这些控件不能支持的内部函数使用属性。Note that, if you declare custom controls that inherit from the base class within a , these controls cannot support the use of the intrinsic properties. 因此，您無法宣告其中包括属性，例如此类控件上的属性属性和属性。Thus, you cannot declare the properties on such controls, including properties such as the property and the property. 与此相反，其他类型的服务器控件 (如控件、 用户控件和继承的自定义控件) 可以声明这些属性，因为它们支持 expando 属性的用法。In contrast, other types of server controls (such as controls, user controls, and custom controls that inherit from ) can declare these properties, because they support the use of expando properties. Expando 属性是实际的字符串，可以添加到类动态属性，通过接口。Expando properties are actually strings that can be added to a class dynamically as a property, by means of the interface. 实现此接口的控件包括类及其子项中，可以使用 expando 属性。Controls that implement this interface, including the class and its children, can use expando properties. 因为基类不支持 expando 属性，继承的自定义控件时类置于并使用已包装控件在运行时，Web 部件控件集不能动态添加内部函数自定义控件的属性。Because the base class does not support expando properties, when a custom control that inherits from the class is placed in a and wrapped with a control at run time, the Web Parts control set cannot dynamically add the intrinsic properties to the custom control. 在这种情况下有两种选择。You have two choices in this case. 可以使用自定义控件不带属性，或者可以实现中自定义控件，使其能够使用的属性的接口。You can use the custom control without the properties, or you can implement the interface in the custom control, enabling it to use the properties. 作为如何的示例控件继承自可以使用属性，如果声明 ASP.NET控件中页的标记 (内区域) 在设计时，即使此控件不会继承从类，并不本机包含成员，您可以仍将它视为完全相同控件。As an example of how controls that inherit from can use the properties, if you declare an ASP.NET control in the markup of a page (within a zone) at design time, even though this control does not inherit from the class and does not natively contain members, you can still treat it exactly like a control. 您可以声明在日历上的属性控制，如， ，等等。You can declare properties on the calendar control, such as , , and others. 在运行时，可以使用方法，它将返回控件，可动态包装日历控件，并使用它以编程方式完全像使用控件，有权访问所有相同属性、 事件和方法。At run time, you can use the method, which returns the control that is dynamically wrapping the calendar control, and work with it programmatically exactly as you would with a control, with access to all the same properties, events, and methods. 控件具有可访问其基础的服务器控件的关键属性：属性。The control has a critical property that allows you to access its underlying server control: the property. 此属性允许开发人员以编程方式访问的服务器控件。This property allows developers to programmatically access the server control. 属性也由控件的个性化设置数据访问子控件，并执行授权，如果属性设置。The property is also used by the control to access personalization data from the child control, and to perform authorization, if the property is set. 控件具有多个其他属性，所有这些重写从基类继承的属性类。The control has several other properties, all of which override properties inherited from the base class. 如前所述，您可以使用这些属性与任何子控件，以便它可充当控件。As noted, you can use these properties with any child control, so that it can behave as a control. 一个重要属性是属性; 它将确定是否可导出的所有属性，或只有标记为非敏感，可以导出。One important property is the property; it determines whether all the exportable properties, or only those marked as non-sensitive, can be exported. 面向 UI 的属性继承自类，如， ， ， ， ，和，可以是任何服务器控件声明性标记中设置放入区域。The UI-oriented properties inherited from the class, such as , , , , , and , can be set in the declarative markup for any server control that is placed in a zone. 中重要的方法类包含方法，用于创建与关联的控件 （包括子控件） 的集合控件，并方法，该委托到的所有呈现方法被包装的子控件。Important methods in the class include the method, which creates the collection of controls (including child controls) associated with a control, and the method, which delegates all rendering to the wrapped child controls. 在构造函数类受到保护，旨在供内部使用或可扩展性方案。The constructors on the class are protected and are intended either for internal use or for extensibility scenarios. 有一些其他有用见解用于处理控件。There are some additional helpful insights for working with controls. 如果你想要设置中的重写属性的默认值类，您的用户控件或自定义服务器控件可以实现和接口，并重写其成员。If you want to set default values for the overridden properties in the class, your user control or custom server control can implement the and interfaces, and override their members. 在运行时，控件将从实现接口的子控件获取它的实现的属性的值。At run time, the control will get its values for the implemented properties from the child control that implements the interfaces. 如果您的控件定义任何其属性为可个性化 (通过使用`Personalizable`元数据特性)，则控件上会自动启用在运行时，就像可个性化属性的个性化设置这些属性控件。If your control defines any of its properties as personalizable (by using the `Personalizable` metadata attribute), the control automatically enables those properties for personalization at run time, just like the personalizable properties on a control. 如果你想要为控件提供 Web 部件的编辑功能，可以实现接口。If you want to provide Web Parts editing features for your control, you can implement the interface. 在运行时，当调用方法时，控件的代码属性将调用相同的属性中的子控件，并使用子控件的实现来创建关联的自定义控件。At run time, when the method is called, the control's code for the property will call into the same property in the child control, and use the child control's implementation to create associated custom controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何控件自动换行不是服务器控件控件在运行时。The following code example demonstrates how the control automatically wraps a server control that is not a control at run time. 代码示例的第一个部分包含以两个 Web 部件页控件。The first part of the code example contains a Web Parts page with two controls. 每个区域中是标准的 ASP.NET 服务器控件。Within each zone is a standard ASP.NET server control. 因为这些控件位于区域，它们将自动换行与控制编译页面时。Because the controls are in a zone, they will be automatically wrapped with a control when the page is compiled. 因此，您可以声明类这些控件上的属性。So, you can declare class properties on these controls. 如果您单击加载在浏览器的页面后**显示所有属性值**按钮，详细信息的每个控件显示在标签中。After you load the page in a browser, if you click the **Display All Property Values** button, the details for each control are displayed in a label. 若要显示如何控制的工作原理，第一个区域中的控件具有的一些.aspx 页中，声明性标记中设置属性而控件不。To show how the control works, the control in the first zone has some of the properties set in the declarative markup of the .aspx page, whereas the control does not. 加载页面后，请注意在两个控件的属性值中的差异和都有一个父级控件。After you load the page, note the differences in the property values for the two controls, and that both have a parent control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#1)] 代码示例的第二部分显示访问的某些属性的分部类以编程方式控制。The second part of the code example shows a partial class that accesses some properties of the control programmatically. 请注意，在`Page_Load`方法，方法用于检索的运行时实例包装一个服务器控件的控件。Notice that in the `Page_Load` method, the method is used to retrieve the run-time instance of the control that wraps a server control. 获取对父引用的这种方法控件使您能够以编程方式使用普通的服务器或用户控件，就好像控件在运行时。This approach of getting a reference to the parent control enables you to work programmatically with an ordinary server or user control as if it were a control at run time. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#3)]

para.span: 有几个情况下有必要从继承类。

span.span: There are few occasions where it is necessary to inherit from the class.

para.span: 这样一种情况是开发人员需要在构造函数中实现某些自定义操作时创建控件。

span.span: One such case would be if a developer wants to implement some custom action in the constructor when a control is created.

para.span: 例如，你可能想要存储子控件以外的控件集合中其他地方类。

span.span: For example, you might want to store the child control somewhere other than the control collection within the class.

para.span: 如果继承自类，您还需要从继承类并重写其方法以使其能够创建自定义控件。

span.span: If you inherit from the class, you also need to inherit from the class and override its method to enable it to create your custom control.
Introduction to Web Parts

related.span: 概述： Web 部件控件集

span.span: Overview: The Web Parts Control Set
Web Parts Personalization
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

span.span: A server control that becomes the child control of the control instance.

summary.span: 通过传入对成为子控件的控件的引用来初始化 控件的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of a control by passing in a reference to a control that becomes the child control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将调用构造函数控制其方法来初始化的实例控件通过传入对其子服务器控件的引用。The constructor is called by the control in its method, to initialize an instance of a control by passing in a reference to a child server control. 之后对象后，可以引用子控件使用属性。After the object is created, you can reference the child control using the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置图像的 URL，该图像在控件目录中表示一个 控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that represents a control in a catalog of controls.

value.span: 表示图像的 URL 的字符串，该图像用于在目录中表示控件。

span.span: A string that represents the URL to an image used to represent the control in a catalog.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件应用程序通常提供的用户可以添加到页面的控件的一个目录 （或列表）。Web Parts applications often provide a catalog (or list) of controls that users can add to a page. 控件上的属性包含在目录中出现时表示控件的图像的 URL。The property on a control contains the URL to an image that represents the control when it appears in a catalog. 此属性重写基属性，以便可以访问的子控件的属性，就像真正的控件。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 您可以和编程您 Web 页上，在声明性标记中的控件上设置属性的值。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要为属性提供默认值，只要使用该控件，可以实现接口。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整源代码概述主题。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 代码示例的第一部分演示如何内的服务器控件上以声明方式设置属性控件。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 代码示例的第二部分演示如何以编程方式访问属性的值，当用户单击的方法**显示所有属性值**按钮。The second part of the code example demonstrates the method that programmatically accesses the value of the property when a user clicks the **Display All Property Values** button. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取对子控件的引用，该子控件在运行时将由 控件包装。

span.span: Gets a reference to the child control that is wrapped by a control at run time.

value.span: 引用被包装的子控件的 。

span.span: A that refers to the wrapped child control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供了访问由包装的子控件的方法控件。The property provides the means to access the child control wrapped by a control. 例如，控件使用要从子控件提取个性化设置数据属性。For example, the control uses the property to extract personalization data from the child control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 以编程方式访问属性可检索信息的子控件控件。The property is accessed programmatically to retrieve information about the child control of a control. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整源代码概述主题。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

summary.span: 由 ASP.NET 页框架调用，以通知服务器控件在准备回发或呈现时使用基于撰写的实现来创建其所包含任何子控件。

span.span: Called by the ASP.NET page framework to notify server controls that use composition-based implementation to create any child controls they contain in preparation for posting back or rendering.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override System.Web.UI.ControlCollection CreateControlCollection ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.ControlCollection CreateControlCollection() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateControlCollection () As ControlCollection
protected: override System::Web::UI::ControlCollection ^ CreateControlCollection();
override this.CreateControlCollection : unit -> System.Web.UI.ControlCollection

summary.span: 重写基方法，以创建由 控件所包装的子控件组成的只读集合。

span.span: Overrides the base method to create a read-only collection that consists of the child control wrapped by a control.
A that contains the child control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个专用的只读集合，包含单个控件，它是子控件的控件。The method creates a private, read-only collection that consists of a single control, which is the child control of a control. 此集合创建，因此开发人员不能手动添加到其他控件控件。This collection is created so that developers cannot manually add other controls to a control. 如果你想要创建自定义控件而无需将子控件添加到专用的集合，您可以从其中类中重写构造函数，并提供用于存储子控件的不同方法所引用的属性。If you want to create a custom control without adding the child control to the private collection, you can derive from the class, override the constructor, and provide a different method for storing the child control referenced by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection CreateEditorParts ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection CreateEditorParts() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateEditorParts () As EditorPartCollection
public: override System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::EditorPartCollection ^ CreateEditorParts();
override this.CreateEditorParts : unit -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection

summary.span: 返回自定义 控件的集合，这些控件可用于在 控件的子控件处于编辑模式时对其进行编辑。

span.span: Returns a collection of custom controls that can be used to edit the child control of a control when it is in edit mode.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含与服务器控件关联的自定义 控件。

span.span: An that contains custom controls associated with a server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件进入编辑显示模式，则调用方法。The method is called when a control enters edit display mode. 此方法重写基方法继承自类，因为的情况下控件，它是正在编辑，没有子控件控件本身。This method overrides the base method inherited from the class because, in the case of a control, it is the child control that is being edited, not the control itself. 方法强制转换到的子控件接口，这使得控件可以对其进行编辑。The method casts the child control to the interface, which enables the control to be edited. 此重写的方法是一种使服务器控件不派生自类-包括 ASP.NET 服务器控件和自定义服务器控件-若要对其进行编辑作为普通控件。This overridden method is what enables server controls that do not derive from the class--including ASP.NET server controls, and custom server controls--to be edited as normal controls.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Description { get; set; }
.property instance string Description
Public Overrides Property Description As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Description : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一条短语，该短语在服务器控件的工具提示和目录中用来概述该控件的作用。

span.span: Gets or sets a brief phrase that summarizes what a control does, for use in ToolTips and catalogs of server controls.

value.span: 字符串，简要概述控件的功能。

span.span: A string that briefly summarizes the control's functionality.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值通常用于为控件提供了服务器控件的列表的目录中的描述性字符串，并为工具提示控件的标题栏中。The property value is typically used as a descriptive string for a control in catalogs that provide lists of server controls, and as a ToolTip in a control's title bar. 该属性的内容的用户将鼠标指针定位控件的标题栏中的标题文本上时显示工具提示中。The content of the property appears in a ToolTip when a user positions the mouse pointer over the title text in a control's title bar. 此属性重写基属性，以便可以访问的子控件的属性，就像真正的控件。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 您可以和编程您 Web 页上，在声明性标记中的控件上设置属性的值。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要为属性提供默认值，只要使用该控件，可以实现接口。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整源代码概述主题。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 代码示例的第一部分演示如何内的服务器控件上以声明方式设置属性控件。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 代码示例的第二部分演示如何访问属性以编程方式在标签中显示它的值。The second part of the code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically to display its value in a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

member this.Subtitle : string

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串与 属性值连接即形成控件的完整标题。

span.span: Gets a string that is concatenated with the property value to form a complete title for a control.

value.span: 作为控件副标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that serves as a subtitle for the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用（可选） 要返回的标准副标题字符串将追加到您的自定义属性控件的标题。Use the property optionally to return a standard subtitle string that will be appended to your custom control's title. 此属性重写基属性，以便可以访问的子控件的属性，就像真正的控件。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 如果你实现了中的用户控件或自定义控件提供的默认值的属性，将自动设置的 Web 部件控件将其追加到的控件的值属性在运行时创建的完整标题。If you implement the property in a user control or custom control to provide a default value, the Web Parts control set automatically appends it to the value of the control's property at run time to create a complete title.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title of a control.

value.span: 一个表示部件控件的标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the title of the part control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过设置部件控件的标题栏中的可见标题文本属性。The visible title text in a part control's title bar is set by the property. 如果未提供控件的标题的 Web 部件控件集自动计算要使用的标题的默认字符串。If you do not supply a title for a control, the Web Parts control set automatically calculates a default string to use as a title. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 此外，就可以提供默认副标题追加到标题字符串。Also, it is possible to provide a default subtitle that is appended to the title string. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For details, see . 此属性重写基属性，以便可以访问的子控件的属性，就像真正的控件。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 您可以和编程您 Web 页上，在声明性标记中的控件上设置属性的值。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要为属性提供默认值，只要使用该控件，可以实现接口。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整源代码概述主题。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 代码示例的第一部分演示如何内的服务器控件上以声明方式设置属性控件。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 代码示例的第二部分演示如何访问属性以编程方式在标签中显示它的值。The second part of the code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically to display its value in a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置图像的 URL，该图像用于在 控件自身的标题栏中表示该控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image used to represent a control in the control's own title bar.

value.span: 表示图像的 URL 的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the URL to an image.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够将与图标关联控件。The property provides a way to associate an icon with a control. 控件的标题栏中显示图标。The icon appears in the control's own title bar. 为了确保主题保持一致，应用程序开发人员通常使此图标类似于表示 Web 部件控件目录中的控件的图像 (中引用的映像属性)。For thematic consistency, application developers often make this icon similar to the image that represents the control in a catalog of Web Parts controls (the image referenced in the property). 在 Web 部件控件集，实现属性可以由最终用户能够更改控件的标题栏中显示的图标的图像进行个性化处理。As it is implemented in the Web Parts control set, the property can be personalized by end users to change the image or icon that appears in a control's title bar. 此属性重写基属性，以便可以访问的子控件的属性，就像真正的控件。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 您可以和编程您 Web 页上，在声明性标记中的控件上设置属性的值。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要为属性提供默认值，只要使用该控件，可以实现接口。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整源代码概述主题。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 代码示例的第一部分演示如何内的服务器控件上以声明方式设置属性控件。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 代码示例的第二部分演示如何访问属性以编程方式在标签中显示它的值。The second part of the code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically to display its value in a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置有关 控件补充信息的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets a URL to supplemental information about a control.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示有关 控件更多信息的 URL。

span.span: A string that represents a URL to more information about a control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在分配到的 URL属性，该控件的标题将成为一个链接。When you assign a URL to the property, the title of the control becomes a link. 此属性提供最终用户可以访问有关控件的其他信息的简便方法。This property provides a convenient way for end users to access additional information about a control. 其他信息可能包括版权数据、 联系人数据有关的控件的创建者或控件用途摘要详细信息。The additional information could include copyright data, contact data, details about the creator of the control, or a summary of the purpose of a control. 此属性重写基属性，以便可以访问的子控件的属性，就像真正的控件。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 您可以和编程您 Web 页上，在声明性标记中的控件上设置属性的值。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要为属性提供默认值，只要使用该控件，可以实现接口。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整源代码概述主题。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 代码示例的第一部分演示如何内的服务器控件上以声明方式设置属性控件。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 代码示例的第二部分演示如何访问属性以编程方式在标签中显示它的值。The second part of the code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically to display its value in a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection Verbs { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection Verbs
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Verbs As WebPartVerbCollection
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPartVerbCollection ^ Verbs { System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPartVerbCollection ^ get(); };
member this.Verbs : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection

summary.span: 获取与 控件关联的自定义谓词的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of custom verbs associated with a control.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含与 控件关联的自定义 对象。

span.span: A that contains custom objects associated with a control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 谓词派生自类，并提供用户界面 (UI) 操作，用户可对执行控件。Verbs derive from the class, and provide user interface (UI) actions that users can perform on a control. 通常情况下，为按钮、 链接或菜单项在 UI 中表示谓词。Usually, verbs are represented in the UI as buttons, links, or menu items. 有标准谓词用于打开、 关闭、 编辑和最小化控件，并用于导出的定义控件或加载帮助文件的其他谓词。There are standard verbs for opening, closing, editing, and minimizing a control, and other verbs for exporting a definition for the control or loading a Help file. 中不包括这些谓词集合，因为该集合包含仅自定义谓词。These verbs are not included in the collection, because the collection contains only custom verbs. 此属性重写基属性，以便可以访问的子控件的属性，就像真正的控件。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 如果子控件实现接口，因此重写其属性，控件使用子控件的实现时属性上调用控件。If you child control implements the interface and thus overrides its property, the control uses the child control's implementation when the property is invoked on the control. 当创建自定义谓词并将其添加到集合，然后，您可以访问的谓词以编程方式从控件。When you create custom verbs and add them to the collection, you can then access the verbs programmatically from a control.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public override object WebBrowsableObject { get; }
.property instance object WebBrowsableObject
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property WebBrowsableObject As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ WebBrowsableObject { System::Object ^ get(); };
member this.WebBrowsableObject : obj

summary.span: 获取对子控件的引用，以使该控件可由自定义 控件进行编辑。

span.span: Gets a reference to the child control, to enable the control to be edited by custom controls.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包括 控件的子控件。

span.span: An that consists of the child control of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果子控件实现接口，并重写其属性，当用户选择用于编辑，控件控件将调用的子控件通过属性，并使用子控件的实现方法。If a child control implements the interface, and overrides its property, when a user selects the control for editing, the control will call into the child control through the property, and use the child control's implementation of the method. 这种机制允许不是一个服务器或用户控件要使用自定义的关联控件Web 部件应用程序中的控件。This mechanism allows a server or user control that is not a control to work with custom associated controls in a Web Parts application.

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the width (in pixels) of the control.
A that indicates the width of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性重写基属性，以便可以获取或设置子控件上的宽度，就像真正的控件。This property overrides the base property so that you can get or set the width on the child control as if it were a true control.
